acordion-client.title: Frequently Asked Questions
acordion-client.answer1: You can find a tasker in the 'Categories' section. Select the appropriate category, and then browse the available taskers who offer relevant services.
acordion-client.question2: How to know the cost of a service?
acordion-client.answer2: The cost of the service will be indicated in the advertisement. You can check the price before contacting the tasker.
acordion-client.question3: What if I need a budget-friendly tasker?
acordion-client.answer3: You can use filters to sort the advertisements based on your budget. This way, you can find taskers that match your financial preferences.
acordion-client.question4: Where can I check the status of my order?
acordion-client.answer4: You can check the status of your order in the 'My Orders' section. This will provide you with updates on the progress of your tasks.
acordion-client.answer5: To cancel an order, go to the 'My Orders' section and click the 'Cancel' button next to the relevant order. Follow the prompts to confirm the cancellation.
